body.p: BUSMASTER can be used as master to transmit master requests and as slave to respond to master requests. User can monitor/analyze the LIN messages using BUSMASTER.The following steps are required to Configure the BUSMASTER for transmission of frame headers or transmission/reception of LIN messages.

ol.li: To Transmit\Receive the LIN Messages BUSMASTER has to be configured with LIN Baud Rate and Version.Refer Cluster Configuration Section for more Information.
To enable master mode for LIN channel for transmitting frame headers, check the Enable Master Mode check box under LIN Network Settings

body.p: Configure Schedule Table window can be used to select schedule table/frame headers for transmission imported from the loaded LDF file if BUSMASTER is used as master. Refer LIN ScheduleTable Configuration for more information.
BUSMASTER can be connected to Physical LIN Network using LIN Controller.Refer Controller Selection section for more Information.
LIN Slave Messages or LIN Master requests Can be transmitted over LIN network using LIN Tx Window.Refer LIN Transmission Window Section for more information.
Once the Cluster & Controllers are properly configured BUSMASTER can be connected to Network using LIN->Connect. menu or the LIN Connect Tool bar Button as shown in following figure.
BUSMASTER Message Window can be used to monitor the LIN messages of LIN Network.Refer LIN Message Window section for more information.
